concept.title: Directory Information under FERPA
concept.shortdesc: Directory information is defined under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), allowing certain student information to be shared without explicit consent.

conbody.p: The Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) protects the privacy of student education records. However, directory information may be shared without explicit consent unless a student opts to restrict access.
Students have the right to restrict their directory information by updating their privacy settings in the MyPack Portal.
